documents.document: @kb sadly probably accurate.
Ask Chamberlain where his policy of appeasing a dangerous, racist demagogue got him.
RNZ's political commentator suggests PM English can't afford to alienate a "mercurial" Trump by condemning his travel ban & I feel queasy.
@HtownWiki think that mistake's embarrassing? Number 5 is clearly a cricket bat. Boy I hope someone got fired for *that* blunder.
@HtownWiki psst, that's a bass.
@HaydenRMunro @not_friends @samdurbin @seemsforever this is how I found out my bandmates hated me. So awkward.
@rainyfraser and I really love your band. And you and G!
@disasteradio I think you kind of have to. You tinker, then you get really into it and start realising you could do MORE, but it's hard.
@shades the "I know where I want to be but I'm not there" part of the learning curve is the hardest place to be.
I'm making an album of those terrible blown-out and blurry failures, to look at next time I'm despairing at how much I suck at something.
But I stubbornly stuck it out (and saved up for a better camera) & by early 2005 my technical abilities catch up with my aspirations again.
Then I got bored of just recording what a band looked like, tried to capture what the show felt like. The photos from 2003-04 are TERRIBLE.
By 2002 I could reliably take a reasonably-composed, well-timed, serviceable snapshot of a band, no mics obscuring faces or blink-face.
It's kinda fascinating, going through every photo I still have, watching both my technique and style develop – not always at the same rate.
I've been escaping the horrors of this world by finally getting on to the photo archiving project I've been meaning to get onto since 2012.
@dakvid the number 5 dairy shed!
@seemsforever do they let you add "ps my lovely wife says 'fuck you'" in work posts?
@lokifer don't get me wrong, I love boobs, but sometimes you need dank dystopian sociological docos.
Think you're easily distracted? I asked Siri for Adam Curtis documentaries, and somehow Siri heard "boobs".
@rmi @duckalini why must the foods we love betray us so? ☕️🐟🧀🍺
@duckalini Right, so, pats and love and no fish that you know about. Got it.
@duckalini Please tell her highness I will reward her generosity soon.
@duckalini THAT LAST ONE WITH THE EAR I HAVE PASSED OUT FROM TOO MUCH CUTE
@duckalini it is an *honour* to be annointed with dB drool. A disgusting honour.
@duckalini she is preposterously cute.
@ryankurte @AtomicPlayb0y I'm keen for All The Things.
@AtomicPlayb0y I use Podcasts mainly for background noise while cooking, walking, the boring bits at the gym.
@AtomicPlayb0y I don't drink and I'm allergic to wine, so
@AtomicPlayb0y remind me mid-2018? After dinner last night I think I have enough new podcasts to last me til then!
This is my benchmark for the friendships I want to form in 2017.
@AtomicPlayb0y I'm hopping back on the wagon, but affordable eats are emphatically my favourite kind.
"Here's that article I was talking about" "This is the podcast I recommended" "I found that phenomenon I forgot the name of!"
I miss the friendships where casual dinner conversations result in annotated bibliographies of all the things you touched on in passing.

I've prepared a comprehensive list of situations where its OK to pressure someone to drink:
That's all of 'em.
@worried_mind see, this is the solutions-focused, problem-solving mindset I need.
@DubiousStephen exactly. Well, not literally. But as a diagnostic category.
@DubiousStephen I like straining my nerves as a working hypothesis though. It's suitably Edwardian-sounding.
@DubiousStephen I don't even know what that is!
@DubiousStephen I kinda fired mine after she wouldn't stop talking about weightloss. I do her weights, but <half the cardio she recommended.
@DubiousStephen entirely possible. I'm just following what my PT instructed but I guess they tend to forget we aren't all Into Fitness.
@DubiousStephen @librarykris I don't drink soft drink, but it sticks around regardless of meals and snacks.
@gnat where can us plebs see this band?
@librarykris interesting. I'd discounted low blood sugar because I don't feel tired or weak or faint on workout days, just glum and moody.
"Treat your pets as they would treat you" doesn't really work when you have cats! https://t.co/TdjoHvg9X3
@librarykris (I literally don't know how this works; my PT gave me lots of food instructions but didn't explain the rationale behind them)
@librarykris would that last all day? I have a snack before and a meal after.
@mrsrosieb mandated by my terrifying orthopaedic surgeon, I'm afraid. I'm not there for fun!
@miss_fae hydration good. Breathing is...yeah, suboptimal. I can't remember to do two things at once!
@_KitchenWitch it's all good! Knowing my messed up body this might just be one of its weird,annoying quirks.
@verdant23 well it can't hurt to try!
@paulie I usually have lunch straight after so I don't think it's hangriness.
How do I make the endorphins do the thing with the thing?
Fitness twitter, about half an hour after a decent workout I feel grumpy and miserable for the rest of the day, no matter how I felt before.
Why do good things happen to bad people?
@SusanStrongman it is a gift that keeps giving.
@SusanStrongman some dogs just wanna rock out tho https://t.co/E48bgiOFaA
@milkshakebot tbf he's probably spent more time around Pall Mall than suburban Westfields.
@ryankurte @duckalini @VulturesLane @jpdanner @peabnuts123 @parsley72 @pikelet @DevTroy what time do the wings start flowing?
NZ fashion labels announcing "Pre-fall" collections? First of all, it's pre-autumn. Second of all, pre-autumn is just summer.
@catatonichic Goddamn, that was five years ago?!
@HaydenRMunro my life goal is to be Churchill's mum.
@lokifer wait till you find the $3 wine.
@davidfarrier I love that building, but isn't anyone else suspicious as to why the Newmarket Lodge meets in Ponsonby?
@j20r sir, I'm going to need to temporarily revoke your dadjoke licence.
@_Kimbabwe_ sure, people are being marginalised and oppressed and killed, but let's not make middleclass white people vaguely uncomfortable.
See, I'm a pacifist, but I'm also a historian, and "non-violent protest never helped anyone's cause" is empirically bullshit.
@hadyngreen @GraemeEdgeler yeah, "the largest audience to witness an inauguration, period"
That's the second batch down. https://t.co/1IT9BNmaWO
@kb @saniac it's the "don't litter" logo on a McDonalds takeaway bag of the wine world.
@rbrandz (my experience with women on Tinder is that everyone ghosts everyone!)
@rbrandz oops, sorry – that was presumptuous! Still, demanding a stranger continue to make conversation isn't an endearing quality.
@rbrandz the kind of persistence that's cute in rom coms and hella fucking creepy irl.
Still trying to find a source of gherkin cucumbers in Auckland and Google just wants to show me Hot Automated Testers In My Area.
@superleeni spontaneously flying to Australia for a weekend to see an entertainer you like is perfectly reasonable adult behaviour.
@Styla73 I'm smirking at "...and another one of their hits" https://t.co/CoEH4OvwYN
@NatDudley punching-down "humour" is a damn effective way to normalise attitudes. Basically says "it's funny because we all know it's true"
@NatDudley framed as a "joke", of course, but I'd quite like the person on whom my life potentially depends to feel OK asking for IT help.
@NatDudley you've reminded me of my last Greenlane appt. There was an IT dept poster in the consult room literally calling users 'idiots'.
@Styla73 The hivemind says no. Thanks, hivemind! https://t.co/uSMtylLCgh
Melbourne friends – I'm flying over for the extra show. Get your tickets and join me? https://t.co/QIrJxU5kwx
A third of the people who responded to this survey are monsters *eyetwitch* https://t.co/mQtoDrzn1L
Melbourne friends! Please come to this with me! https://t.co/V0l1en524V
@rmi There's one Xander-centric episode around S3 and every time I'm like "huh, I don't remember seeing this one". Every. Time.
@NatDudley @rmi @BadBuffyOutfits I just want to give baby-Willow a hug and take her shopping for something non-fuzzy.
@rmi you expected more from Yahoo Answers?
@ehjc this is the Wellington-est tweet that was ever tweeted. I will never understand the jandals-and-Kathmandu-puffer-jacket combo.
@Mrblinkandmizit @JohnnyRedLives @moragatchison @Tazu_berri @scuba_nurse @heliopathic @VishOnAMish well done team!
@librarykris giraffes are a delight to feed. Two words: prehensile tongue.

Just getting the supplies ready for tonight's get-together. https://t.co/CRy9IoXGpm https://t.co/5lkexfaCbk
@Reksington alternative hypothesis to "users are stupid": we are, as a profession, a bit shit at explaining things clearly.
Say it loud for the people in the back: your users aren't "stupid" (and frankly, if they are, then we owe them an e… https://t.co/kTh8NYROGK
The same woman just slammed a basket down on top of the perfectly ripe avocado I'd just bought. I don't think she likes her job much.
@dimsie please tell me she doesn't also waste good steak on bruises.
@dimsie the practice ended centuries ago, but the folk belief that a burn will heal faster if you put butter on it stuck around.
@dimsie cf: putting butter on burns. Goes back to English butter being dyed with vaguely-antimicrobal calendular petals to look yellower.
@superleeni can't see a ride thing! We're by the mall lift.
@parsley72 I *do* enjoy lurking around @duckalini's flat like a creeper, it's true...
